aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Ayush Khamrui
aboutData.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer & GenAI Developer
aboutData.text: I am a Senior Software Engineer with a focus on crafting efficient backend solutions and integrating advanced Generative AI technologies. My work combines technical excellence with a deep understanding of LLMs and AI-driven systems, aimed at optimizing business processes and delivering innovative, scalable solutions.

services.title: Web Development
services.text: Build scalable web applications using Flask, FastAPI, and React with optimized backend solutions and finally hosting them in cloud.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.text: Craft intuitive, user-centric interfaces adhering to industry standards for seamless user experience and engagement.

services.title: GenAI Chatbot Development
services.text: Develop intelligent chatbots integrating Generative AI, enhancing interactions through React and Python solutions.

services.title: App Development
services.text: Deliver cross-platform apps using React Native, blending functionality with elegant and responsive designs.

services.title: Generative AI and Large Language Model (LLM) Consulting
services.text: Implement LLM systems with advanced retrievers, optimization techniques, and scalable architectures.

services.title: Generative AI Adoption Strategies
services.text: Drive organizational adoption of Generative AI, optimizing workflows with tools like AWS Bedrock and Azure OpenAI.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in the field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: I am a Senior Software Engineer with expertise in backend development, Generative AI, and LLMs. At Capgemini, I have led teams to design advanced AI systems using AWS Bedrock, Azure OpenAI, LangChain, etc. Skilled in Python, Flask, FastAPI, and React. I build scalable APIs and optimize LLM performance using prompt engineering and retrieval mechanisms. I have integrated tools like Neo4j, ChromaDB, and Redis to enhance application efficiency. I have driven Generative AI adoption through pilot projects and innovative tools like CodeWhisperer. Recognized as a "Star" employee, I excel in delivering impactful, innovative solutions in Agile environments.

informations.title: Exploring Canvas by OpenAI: A Game-Changer for Collaborative Writing and Coding
GANs Unleashed: Creating with Generative Adversarial Networks
Unveiling the Magic of Transformer Architectures
Spriha Srivastava
informations.text: Ayush is an exceptional full stack developer with a unique flair for Gen AI development. I had the privilege of managing him directly, witnessing his outstanding ability to navigate complex projects with ease. Ayush seamlessly integrates cutting-edge technologies into his work, delivering innovative solutions that exceed expectations. He brings a rare combination of technical expertise, creativity, and dedication to every task, making him an invaluable asset to any team. I highly recommend Ayush for his exceptional skills and unwavering commitment to excellence.

informations.title: Areef Sheik
informations.text: Ayush is an exceptional researcher with a deep understanding of GenAI tools and technologies, particularly in the realm of LLMs. I had the privilege of collaborating closely with him, where his profound expertise significantly advanced our GenAI adoption efforts. He combines a rare depth of technical knowledge, consistently delivering solutions that address complex challenges. His ability to demystify advanced concepts and drive meaningful implementation makes him an invaluable asset to any organization. I highly recommend Ayush for his skills, vision, and dedication.

informations.title: Arman Khan
informations.text: Ayush is an exceptional professional with expertise spanning full-stack development, GenAI Technologies. I had the privilege of working with him directly, witnessing his ability to handle complex projects with ease. His proficiency in React and delivering seamless user experiences complements his understanding of GenAI and his contributions towards its adoption. Ayush combines technical expertise & creativity delivering innovative solutions that exceed expectations. He is an invaluable asset to any team, and I highly recommend him for his remarkable skills.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.subTitle: Capgemini, Bangalore
experience.text: Led a team in architecting advanced LLM systems using AWS Bedrock, Azure, and LangChain, optimizing AI performance through retrieval techniques and prompt engineering. I developed scalable backend solutions with Python, Flask, and FastAPI, integrated tools like Neo4j and Redis to enhance application efficiency, and spearheaded frontend development for GenAI chatbots using React, focusing on seamless user interaction and intuitive design.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.subTitle: Capgemini, Mumbai
experience.text: I built an "On Demand Car Wash" platform, developing a dynamic React frontend and integrating it with a robust backend to enable seamless booking and service management.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
experience.subTitle: Highradius, Hyderabad
experience.text: I designed an AI-Enabled Fintech B2B Cloud Application, implementing an intuitive React frontend and integrating AI-driven analytics with a secure, scalable backend to optimize business workflows.

education.title: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication
education.subTitle: Maulana Abul Kalam Azad University of Technology, West Bengal
education.text: Published 3 research papers (1 in Chemistry, 2 in IoT) and a patent on a biometric-controlled car ignition system (Patent No: 202031031645 A).
